import { DashboardFilter } from '@looker/filter-components'
import { ImportMessage, Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import storyExpressionOnChange from '!!raw-loader!./ExpressionOnChange'
import storySuggestions from '!!raw-loader!./Suggestions'
import storyRequired from '!!raw-loader!./Required'

<Meta component={DashboardFilter} title="Filters/Docs/DashboardFilter" />

# DashboardFilter

<ImportMessage packageName="filter-components">DashboardFilter</ImportMessage>

`DashboardFilter` renders a dashboard filter as returned by the Looker API.

**Note:** for more direct rendering control, see the [`Filter`](filter) component.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

## expression & onChange

Use `onChange` to get updates to the `expression`.

<Editor code={storyExpressionOnChange} />

## Suggestions

When the filter is on a field where the `suggestable` property is true,
the supplied `sdk` instance will be used to fetch the suggested values.

<Editor code={storySuggestions} />

## Required

When `required` is true an error message will render below the filter when the expression is empty.

<Editor code={storyRequired} />

## Props

<ArgsTable of={DashboardFilter} exclude={excludedProps} />
